fields.summary: Bad initialisation of StringBuffer in RequestHedgingProxyProvider.java

comments.body: Thanks [~xiemaisi] for reporting this. I checked for this, it's true that this line {{new StringBuilder('[');}} will just used the method {{java.lang.StringBuilder.StringBuilder(int capacity)}} rathan than {{java.lang.StringBuilder.StringBuilder(String str)}}. Attach a simple patch from me to fix this.
